2019 Copa America Venue

The 2019 Copa America will take place in six venues in five wonderful Brazilian cities: Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Belo Horizonte, Porto Alegre, and Salvador. Three of the venues were used for the 2014 World Cup and all of them will provide a memorable viewing experience. The final match will take place at one of the world’s most beloved venues: Maracanã Stadium.

Maracanã Stadium is one of the largest stadiums in the world with a seating capacity of 75,000. The famous stadium underwent an extensive renovation in preparation for the 2014 World Cup and is sure to provide an incredible atmosphere for fans at the 2019 Copa America Championship Final.
